document.full_text: japan's honda motor co plans to start producing electric cars in china as early as next year, the boldest step so far by a global automaker to tap as yet unproven demand for green cars in the world's largest auto market.
document.title: new-energy vehicles take spotlight at shanghai show
lines_and_colors: japan's honda motor co plans to start producing electric cars in china as early as next year, the boldest step so far by a global automaker to tap as yet unproven demand for green cars in the world's largest auto market.
